import { useState } from 'react'; import style from './FormConctact.module.css' const FormContact = () => { const [stateNome, changeNome] = useState('') const [stateCognome, changeCognome] = useState('') const [stateNascita, changeNascita] = useState('') const [stateData, changeData] = useState('') const [stateIndirizzo, changeIndirizzo] = useState('') const [stateCitta, changeCitta] = useState('') const [stateProvincia, changeProvincia] = useState('') const [stateCurriculum, changeCurriculum] = useState('') const [stateLavoro, changeLavoro] = useState('part') const [stateTelefono, changeTelefono] = useState('') const [stateMail, changeMail] = useState('') /////////////////////////////////////////////////////// const [stateActiveNome, changeActiveNome] = useState(false) const [stateActiveCognome, changeActiveCognome] = useState(false) const InvioForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() } /////////////////////////////////////////////////////// const validateName = (event) => { const evento = event.target.value if(evento === ''){ changeActiveNome(true) }else{ changeActiveNome(false) changeNome(evento) } } const validateCognome = (event) => { const evento = event.target.value if(evento === ''){ changeActiveCognome(true) }else{ changeActiveCognome(false) changeCognome(evento) } } //////////////////////////////////////////////////////// return(

con validazione, conferma ed invio\richiesta dati
